rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C189265

definition: Terminology relevant to the role of the individual or entity responsible for the receipt of the transferred object (e.g., device, specimen).
name: Accountable Party

terms.definition: A person or group that facilitates the exchange of items or information.
An organization with the capability and competency to perform scientific research, experiments, and measurements. (BRIDG)
The organization defined as being responsible for creating the product as stated on the package in which the product is supplied. (BRIDG)

An individual, company, institution, or organization that takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. [After ICH E6, WHO, 21 CFR 50.3 (e), and after IDMP]
The organization that manages the storage of items.
An individual who is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
